statements: DELETE FROM backups WHERE database_name = 'customers' AND backup_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM backup_history WHERE id = 5 AND database_name = 'DB1';
DELETE FROM backup_plan WHERE last_backup_timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND frequency = 'daily';

DELETE FROM backups
WHERE database_name = 'sales' AND backup_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
